The current unnamed Lord '''Kaiyang''' is one of the seven current members of the [[Liyue Qixing]], governing [[Liyue]] alongside the Yuheng [[Keqing]], the Tianquan [[Ningguang]],<ref name="Commanders">{{Ref/Quest|Commanders and Wargames}}</ref> the Tianshu [[Uncle Tian]],<ref>{{Ref/Quest|A Secretary in a Sea of Humanity}}</ref> and three others.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Huixin}}</ref>

==Profile==
The Kaiyang has worked alongside Ningguang, commenting that she, who knows all the secrets in Liyue, is the biggest secret in all of Liyue.<ref>Hoyolab: [https://www.hoyolab.com/article/9893 Jade Star in the Sky - Ningguang]</ref> The Kaiyang proposed a collaborative Wargame of Five Armies between Liyue and its four neighboring nations to Ningguang, resulting in a joint venture between the [[Millelith]], [[Knights of Favonius]], [[Yashiro Commission]], [[Corps of Thirty]], and [[Garde]]s.<ref name="Commanders" />
